text:
Yeah I'll have a search, do you know any sites where there are some decent elements that I can get? I've had a look around and I've found a few bits but if you know anywhere its always good to add more of a variety :laughing:

Yeah thats a good shout with the sand especially, I've got some 2D elements for the footsteps with sand that I can use and I'm pretty sure I can find some atmospherics :ok_hand: Thanks for the advice!
